abstract: DealBook Online; Borse Dubai says it has sold its entire 17.4 percent stake in London Stock Exchange Group.
lead_paragraph: The holding company for the Dubai Financial Market and Nasdaq Dubai was the largest shareholder in the London exchange. The sale is estimated at as much as $2.2 billion.

headline.main: Borse Dubai Sells Its Stake in London Stock Exchange Group

snippet: The holding company for the Dubai Financial Market and Nasdaq Dubai was the largest shareholder in the London exchange. The sale is estimated at as much as $2.2 billion.
